education.title: Indian Institute of Technology, Madras
education.description: Activities and Societies: 1. Attained 2nd place representing IIT Madras in Team Abhiyaan in IGVC competition 2019, Oakland University, USA which focused on building autonomous vehicles. Received commendation from Dr. Bhaskar Ramamurthy (Director of IITM) for the achievement 2. As Head of I&AR student council, Spearheaded a team of 18 members to organize Alumni related events. Supported the office of I&AR in garnering record funding of more than INR 50+ crores through fundraising events Academic Projects: Worked on Research Paper "Combinatorial cascading bandits" with Prof Arjun Rajkumar (Dept. of Computer Science) Worked on differential private learning on sensitive datasets for large-scale recommendation systems ÔÇ∑ Created a high-performing modified version of cascading bandit algorithm which gave an improvement in model performance by ~29% and better time complexity Club activities: 1. Sponsorship & PR coordinator, Saarang 2019 Manage both‚Ä¶ Show more

projects: [{"title":"NLP - ChatGPT Prompt Engineering Analysis","start_date":"Jul 2023","end_date":"Aug 2023","description":"An NLP project in which ChatGPT prompts were analyzed and performed EDA (Exploratory Data Analysis).Refer to Notebook in Github for more information"},{"title":"BERT LLM Chatbot Intent Prediction","start_date":"Jun 2023","end_date":"Aug 2023","description":"A project which uses Large Language Model (LLM) for predicting the intent of a customer in a chat and thus helping to arrive actionable decision based on it."}]
